## base64Decode() function

Decodes a UTF8 string from the given base64 encoded ASCII string.

```
base64Decode('dg==') // => 'v'
base64Decode('6b6Z') // => '龙'
base64Decode('8J+QsQ==') // => '🐱'

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function base64Decode(value: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string | The given base64 encoded ASCII string. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

Returns the decoded UTF8 string.
